reviews.text:
Jaw dropping goodness with amazing vibe! 
Highlights (although everything was amazing)
1) Chase our server...when someone makes my dining experience top...
Perfect afternoon stop. Food, drinks and service all top notch!  Great vibe!  I'll be back!  Thanks Maggie.
Ever since "Covid", service and food has really gone down hill (in my opinion and experience) BUT this place has been phenomenal during both of our visits....
